Ghommal's hilt 4 is a reward from completing the elite Combat Achievements. It is given to players by Ghommal at the Warriors' Guild entrance, and can be retrieved from him for free if lost.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0+0+0
 Defence bonuses
+0+0+0+0+0
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+0List

Benefits[edit | edit source]

From Ghommal's hilt 1-3[edit | edit source]

  • Unlimited teleports to the God Wars Dungeon entrance (by the large boulder)
  • A 5% increased chance to receive easy, medium, and hard clue scrolls from all sources (excluding implings)
  • Ability to create a dragon hunter crossbow (b) by combining it with kbd heads

Ghommal's hilt 4 only[edit | edit source]

A player teleporting with Ghommal's hilt.
  • Three daily teleports to Mor Ul Rek (within the inner city)
  • An antique lamp worth 25,000 experience in any skill above 50
  • A 5% increased chance to receive an elite clue scroll from all sources (excluding implings)
  • Like a boss slayer unlock will now allow players to have up to 43 boss kills (a +8 increase) when assigned a boss task
  • God Wars Dungeon benefits:
    • God Wars Dungeon boss entrances now require 36 follower kill count to enter instead of 38
    • Ecumenical key drop rate is now increased from 1/55 to 1/50
    • Access to privately rented instances for God Wars Dungeon boss rooms, costing 125,000 coins and follower kill count/ecumenical keys
  • Ability to create a dragon hunter crossbow (t) by combining it with Vorkath's head
  • Ghommal can make players a Tztok slayer helmet

[[File:Ghommal's hilt 4 detail.png|left|100px]]
'''Ghommal's hilt 4''' is a reward from completing the [[elite Combat Achievements]]. It is given to players by [[Ghommal]] at the [[Warriors' Guild]] entrance, and can be retrieved from him for free if lost.

==Benefits==
===From Ghommal's hilt 1-3===
* Unlimited teleports to the God Wars Dungeon entrance (by the large boulder)
* A 5% increased chance to receive [[easy clue scroll|easy]], [[medium clue scroll|medium]], and [[hard clue scroll]]s from all sources (excluding [[impling]]s)
* Ability to create a [[dragon hunter crossbow (b)]] by combining it with [[kbd heads]]

===Ghommal's hilt 4 only===
[[File:Ghommal's hilt teleport.gif|thumb|200px|right|A player teleporting with [[Ghommal's hilt]].]]
* Three daily teleports to [[Mor Ul Rek]] (within the inner city)
* An [[Antique lamp (Hard Combat Achievements)|antique lamp]] worth 25,000 experience in any skill above 50
* A 5% increased chance to receive an [[elite clue scroll]] from all sources (excluding [[impling]]s)
* [[Like a boss]] slayer unlock will now allow players to have up to 43 boss kills (a +8 increase) when assigned a boss task
* [[God Wars Dungeon]] benefits:
** God Wars Dungeon boss entrances now require 36 follower kill count to enter instead of 38
** [[Ecumenical key]] drop rate is now increased from 1/55 to 1/50
** Access to privately rented instances for God Wars Dungeon boss rooms, costing 125,000 coins and follower kill count/ecumenical keys
* Ability to create a [[dragon hunter crossbow (t)]] by combining it with [[Vorkath's head]]
* [[Ghommal]] can make players a [[Tztok slayer helmet]]
